title: How to Make a Marble Glow Night Light

steps.headline: Remove label from wine bottle and clean well.
steps.description: You may need to give it a good scrubbing if the label leaves debris behind. Make sure you allow ample dry time for the wine bottle before proceeding to the next steps.

steps.headline: Drill hole on the lower side of the bottle.
steps.description:
You will want to drill a hole large enough to string lights through. Don’t forget the protective gear before drilling/cutting the hole.
